Статические открытые данные

static string WorkingDir = Environment.CurrentDirectory
 
static string ProjectDir = Directory.GetParent(WorkingDir).Parent.Parent.FullName
 
static string SourceDir = Path.Combine(ProjectDir, @"Source")
 
static string LevelSpritesDir = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "Level")
 
static string MonstersSpritesDir = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "Monsters")
 
static string PlayerSpritesDir = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "Player")
 
static string CoinsSpritesDir = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "Coins")
 
static string GUISpritesDir = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "GUI")
 
static string Fonts = Path.Combine(SourceDir, "Fonts")
